import React,{useCallback}from'react';import{Button}from'@mui/material';import Papa from'papaparse';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DataUploader=_ref=>{let{onDataUpload}=_ref;const handleFileChange=useCallback(event=>{const file=event.target.files[0];if(file){Papa.parse(file,{header:true,skipEmptyLines:true,complete:result=>{onDataUpload(result.data);},error:error=>{console.error('Error parsing CSV:',error);alert('Error parsing CSV file.
